Texts.Chs:
落地节, 一场庆祝数百年前埃癸人在以利提亚登陆的大狂欢, 已经开始啦! 活动特记事项:

- 新地图^cyan;节日大厅^reset;, 现在可以通过克里昂使馆的传送器抵达！

- 新的节日风^cyan;装饰物^reset;, ^cyan;装甲^reset;, ^cyan;武器^reset; and ^cyan;套装^reset;！

- 可获取 ^orange;特别物品^reset;的新任务！

- 一系列五光十色的^cyan;花火^reset;可供选择！

- 在节日大厅里的^cyan;每日礼物^reset;！ 前往节日大厅的大型装饰树，免费获取它们！

- 再度获得错过的^cyan;独特节日礼物^reset;！ 它们会从落地节礼包中随机掉落！
Texts.Eng:
The Landing Festival, a celebration of the Aegi's arrival on Elithia hundreds of years ago, has arrived! This event features:

- A new location, the ^cyan;Festival Hall^reset;, accessible through a teleporter in the Creon Embassy

- New event-themed ^cyan;decorative objects^reset;, ^cyan;armour pieces^reset;, ^cyan;weapons^reset; and ^cyan;consumables^reset;

- New quests for obtaining event-themed ^orange;Unique-quality items^reset;

- ^cyan;Fireworks^reset; available in various colours

- ^cyan;Daily presents^reset; in the Festival Hall. Visit the large decorated tree in the Festival Hall for a free daily present

- A second chance at obtaining ^cyan;items missed in previous events^reset;. These items drop randomly from Landing Festival Presents!
